summary: One woman's strength and courage under the most extreme weather conditions.
cast: Susan Sarandon|Aidan Devine|Cynthia Mace|Paulino Nunes|Steve Cumyn|Carl Marotte|Lorne Cardinal|Kenneth Welsh|Kris Holden-Ried|Richard Waugh|Joe Pingue|LinLyn Lue|Kathryn Zenna|Benz Antoine|Gina Clayton|Aaron Abrams|Lynn Vogt|Sanjay Talwar|Larry Yachimec
title: Atrapada en el hielo
